articles.description: Scotland need just two points from three games to guarantee a place at Euro 2024 next summer. Surely Steve Clarke's side won't mess it up from here?
articles.title: 'Only our wee country could mess it up from here'

articles.description: New Zealand threatened to wreck the building momentum behind the Rugby World Cup hosts but France find a way to defend home turf and march on towards their destiny.
articles.title: Dupont and his French team answer call of a nation

articles.description: England seek to put aside their turbulent build-up by beating Argentina in their opening World Cup match on Saturday, writes rugby correspondent Chris Jones.

articles.description: England bowler Lauren Filer removes Kavisha Dilhari and Nilakshi de Silva in two balls to leave Sri Lanka on 78-6 in the first ODI at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: Filer picks up two wickets in two balls on debut

articles.description: Watch as 17 year-old Mahika Gaur bowls both Chamari Athapaththu and Anushka Sanjeewani on her ODI debut as England take on Sri Lanka in the first ODI match at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: Teenage debutant Gaur removes Sri Lanka openers

articles.description: England boss Gareth Southgate is expecting his side to come up against a passionate pro-Ukraine atmosphere when the two sides meet for a Euro 2024 qualifier at Tarczynski Arena in Poland.
articles.title: Southgate wants England focus in pro-Ukraine crowd
